attributes.action: Restrict the use public tariffs by royal family for their personal spendings and leisure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Royal family is given money to be spent, which is hardly earned by hardworking British men and women. Royal family, without working or taking part in British economy, uses the tariffs paid by us for their spendings. Do you think that is fare? What if the taxes or tariffs paid by you were given to me so that i can buy diamond necklace for my girl friend, how would you feel? Its 21st century, either you take part in growth or you get nothing. It time that royals start working for their own spendings.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
